title: Our land, our water
creator_credit: John King, Tom Williamson and New Zealand National Film Unit
brief_description: A satirical presentation of the exploitation of resources of land, water and people, with the difficulties of satisfying conflicting needs. The responsibility to all users is raised, with the needs of the future in mind. Cast includes Stephen Tozer, Marjorie Brooke-White, Bob Walker, Allan Richards, Kenneth R. Hobman.
